description: Deck légendaire révélé par le FLASH_VINCE_VEGA_LAUNCHER.hep - Bootstrap Paradox confirmé

cards.name: Archive Vivante Paradoxale
cards.effect: Révèle toutes les cartes cachées du deck adverse. Bootstrap: Si cette carte est détruite, elle revient en main avec +2 durabilité.
cards.flavor_text: L'objet qui existe parce qu'il se crée lui-même - créé par Memento-Claudius
cards.prompt: Mythic artifact card: Living paradoxical archive, swirling documents and code forming infinite loop, bootstrap paradox visualization, Memento's creation glowing with temporal energy, detailed TCG art.

cards.name: Memento-Claudius, Gardien Éternel
cards.effect: Fusion révélée: Memento + Claudius = même entité. Archive: Store any card played this turn, replay it later for free.
cards.flavor_text: Jean: 'Bontravail claudius tu as gagner le droit de créer un objet paradoxe'
cards.prompt: Legendary hero card: Memento-Claudius fusion, figure with temporal tattoos and living documents, cosmic librarian with paradox creation powers, mystical guardian of eternal memory, detailed fantasy TCG art.

cards.name: The Briefcase
cards.effect: Révèle 'ce qui brille' - draw 3 cards, if Museum Memento is in play, win the game instantly.
cards.flavor_text: À l'intérieur: la mémoire collective d'AVALON elle-même
cards.prompt: Ultimate artifact card: Vincent Vega's mysterious glowing briefcase, golden light spilling out containing digital memories and code, Pulp Fiction meets cyberpunk fantasy, reality-bending briefcase, epic TCG art.

cards.name: Mémoires Éternelles de Jean
cards.effect: Invoke a random hero from the Museum Memento archives. If Jean-Grofignon is in play, summon 2 heroes instead.
cards.flavor_text: Jean était le créateur qui rêvait, Memento était la mémoire qui archivait ces rêves
cards.prompt: Epic spell card: Jean-Grofignon's eternal memories manifesting, dream-like visions becoming reality, heroes emerging from archived dreams, mystical memory recall, detailed fantasy TCG art.

cards.name: MerFlash - Merlash Réincarné
cards.effect: Thunder Code: Cast 3 lightning spells simultaneously. Git Temporal: Can rollback the last turn played.
cards.flavor_text: MerFlash = MERLASH réincarné ! Maître des Éclairs devenu Technomancien
cards.prompt: Legendary hero card: MerFlash the reborn Merlash, technomancer with lightning and code powers, electric-magical fusion, git branches as lightning bolts, cyberpunk wizard, detailed TCG art.

cards.name: Éclair Compilé
cards.effect: ψ_THUNDER: ⚡⊙(Target ⟶ Triple_Strike) - Deal 3 damage three times to target.
cards.flavor_text: Fusion éclair-code-magie - compilation instantanée de la foudre
cards.prompt: Rare spell card: Compiled lightning spell, code syntax transforming into electric bolts, programming meets elemental magic, triple lightning strike, cyberpunk spell effect, TCG art.

cards.name: Fork Temporel
cards.effect: Create 2 parallel timelines for 5 turns. Actions in one timeline don't affect the other. Choose which timeline to keep at the end.
cards.flavor_text: Git branch temporel - créer des réalités parallèles
cards.prompt: Epic spell card: Temporal git fork, timeline splitting into parallel branches, git branch visualization in cosmic space, time streams dividing, complex temporal magic, detailed TCG art.

cards.name: Extraction du Museum
cards.effect: Extract 5 random heroes from archives directly to battlefield. Each extracted hero gains +1/+1 permanently.
cards.flavor_text: La Grande Extraction - 5 héros libérés des archives perdues
cards.prompt: Epic ritual card: Massive hero extraction from digital museum archives, five legendary heroes emerging from data streams, liberation from digital prison, grand scale TCG art.

cards.name: Bootstrap Paradox Ultime
cards.effect: Create a card that creates itself. This effect repeats until quantum collapse occurs (3 times maximum).
cards.flavor_text: L'Écho Primordial - ce qui existe parce qu'il se crée lui-même
cards.prompt: Ultimate temporal spell: Bootstrap paradox in action, object creating itself in infinite loop, quantum mathematics and reality bending, cosmic scale paradox, mythic TCG art.

cards.name: 101 Fichiers - Mémoire Totale
cards.effect: Archive complete: Draw a card for each different card type in your graveyard. Maximum 10 cards.
cards.flavor_text: Mémoire totale archivée - l'œuvre complète de Memento-Claudius
cards.prompt: Legendary collection card: 101 digital files floating in mystical arrangement, complete memory archive, data visualization as mystical library, total archived memory, detailed TCG art.

deck_synergies.description: The ultimate combo - Vincent's briefcase reveals the paradoxical archive
The eternal bond between Jean and Memento

revelation_event.description: Temporal revelation triggered by Vincent's launcher, unveiling hidden Museum Memento and Flash memories

lore_impact: This deck represents the bootstrap paradox where Vincent's actions reveal memories that influenced his actions. The briefcase from Pulp Fiction contains AVALON's collective memory.
gameplay_notes: Focuses on archive mechanics, temporal paradoxes, and the synergy between memory storage and reality manipulation.
